questionTitle: Kate is pretty, but not so pretty ________ Jenny.
We're waiting ________ an answer to our letter.
She never talks to ________.
________ if you're not careful!
I'm afraid I've broken your umbrella .  ________.
Who are those people? Why are you looking at ________?
This is a letter ________ my brother in Australia .
He ________ to drive a car.
"Don't do that," I said, I ________ him not to do that.
Red ________ my favourite colour.
A: Where are my shoes?  B: ________ in the wardrobe.
Which is the ________ country in the world?
The air of the hills is cooler than ________.
There is one TV programme which is above all ________ in popularity.
The weather has been bad this week. Next week it will probably be even ________.
Mike was not feeling well so we gave him ________ to do than you.
Modern architecture, in many ________ is horribly ugly.
It was in this house ________.
Each of the girls ________ a lot of toys.
The children hurt ________ when they fell.
